testcase.failure:
Given I open Vodafone login page............................................passed When I log in with "postpay_complex" msisdn and "Password"..................failed When I navigate to Bills & Payments Page....................................skipped Then I enter a valid pin and submit.........................................skipped Then I select Setup Direct Debit option.....................................skipped Then I select the Credit Card option for Direct Debit.......................skipped Then I enter the credit card details........................................skipped Then I submit request.......................................................skipped Then I should see the setup success message.................................skipped Then I navigate to Bills & Payments Page....................................skipped Then I select Manage Direct Debit option....................................skipped Then I select Cancel Direct Debit option....................................skipped Then I should see the cancellation success message..........................skipped Then I logout...............................................................skipped
